fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY 3M CAD Diff
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down All CCY 3M CAD] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau row-level multiplication [Delta Down All CCY 3M CAD]*[Date Sign] to DAX using table-qualified column references. Removed Tableau comment lines and preserved exact column names and table name.
fixes.type_changed_reason: Although the expression is a row-level multiplication, the referenced calculated field 'Date Sign' depends on Tableau parameters. Per the rules, any calculation that references parameters (directly or via dependencies) must be created as a measure.
